src_text: Xiyimo xa Khabinete mayelana na timhaka ta nkoka eka nkarhi wa sweswi Khabinete yi amukerile nsimeko evanhwini wa xibukwana xa Swikombiso swa Nhluvukiso hi Holobyenkulu eka Hofisi ya Phuresidente Nandzeleriso na Nhlahluvo wa Matirhel Tanihi loko rixaka ri tilulamisela ku tlangela malembe ya 20 ya Ntshuxeko, Vaaki va Afrika-Dzonga va fanele ku tinyungubyisa hi mhaka ya leswaku vutomi byi cincile hi ndlela yo antswa ku sukela hi 1994.Swikombiso swi kombisa ku antswa eka tindhawu ta nkoka no komba ntirho wa matimba lowa ha faneleke ku endliwa ku lwa na swiphiqo leswi phikelelak Ku ya emahlweni, swikombiso swi hlohlotela njhekanjhekisano eka swiphiqo leswi tiko ra hina ri hlanganaka naswona no tirha tanihi swo tsala eka rendzo ra hina ro humelela eka ku humelela hi tlhelo ra ikhonom Khabinete yi hoyozerile 41% (115) ya timasipala leti nga kumeka tibuku ta tona ti basile eka mikambelo ya 2011/12 ya mikambelo ya timal Yi yile emahlweni no khensa ku antswisiwa loku nga endliwa hi timasipala ta 21 leti nga kuma nsivelo wo humelela kumbe leti nga kuma miehleketo yo aleriwa eka lembe leri nga hundzKhabinete yi khensa ntirho lowu nga endliwa hi Mukambelatinkota-Angarhelo eku pfuneni ka timasipala ku antswisa swilaveko eka mafumel Yi yile emahlweni no khensa ku tinyiketela loku nga endliwa hi vurhangeri bya masipala ku ya emahlweni no tirha ku antswisa tindhawu leti nga kombisiwa hi Mukambelatinkota-Angarhel Khabinete yi khensile vaaki hinkwavo va Afrika-Dzonga eka nseketelo wa vona eka Siku ra Mandela ra Mitlangu na Ndhavuko leri a ri khomiwile ku pfuna phurojeke ya Xibedlhele xa Vana xa Nelson Mandel Vaaki va Afrika-Dzonga va hlohloteriwa ku ya emahlweni ku tirha na vaaki no endla vuxaka na mfumo ku antswisa vutomi bya vaaki no tisa vutomi lebyi Madiba a nga nyikelela byona hi vutomi bya yen Khabinete yi amukerile rendzo leri taka ra Phuresidente Jacob Zuma ku ya eRiphabuliki ya Russi U ta va a ya Enhlengetanini ya Ntlawa wa 20 (G20) eSt Petersburg hi siku ra vuntlhanu na ra vuntsevu ra Ndzhati 2013 tanihi xiphemu xo kurisa swilaveko swa tipolitiki na ikhonomi ya Afrika-DzongAfrika-Dzonga ri ta ya emahlweni no seketela nhluvukiso wa ajenda lowu nga ta yisa emahlweni ntshamiseko wa ikhonomi ya misava na ku kula ka nkarhi wo leha loku nga tiyisisiwa na ku tumbuluxiwa ka mitirh Khabinete yi khensile nhlengeletano yo sungula ya Huvo ya Bindzu ya Brazil, Russia, India, China na Afrika-Dzonga (BRICS), leyi nga vona varhangeri va swa mabindzu ku suka ematikweni lawa a ya hlanganile eAfrika-Dzong Eka nhlengeletano a ku tile varhangeri va swa mabindzu va nkoka ku suka eka matiko ya 19 ya Afrik Khabinete yi amukerile ntiyisiso lowu nga nyikiwa eka Foramu ya vu 12 ya Nawu wa Nkuriso wa Afrika na Nkarhi (AGOA) ku pfuxeta AGOA yi nga se heleriwa hi nkarhi hi 2015.
trg_text: Cabinet s position on prominent issues in the current environment Cabinet welcomed the public launch of the sixth edition of the Development Indicators by the Minister in the Presidency for Performance Monitoring and Evaluatio As the nation prepares to celebrate 20 Years of Freedom, South Africans should be proud that life has changed for the better since 1994.The indicators show improvement in key areas and simultaneously point to the hard work still required to deal with some of our more persistent challenge Furthermore, the indicators encourage debate on the challenges our country faces and act as markers along our journey of socio-economic progres Cabinet commended the 41% (115) of municipalities that received unqualified financial statements on the 2011/2012 financial audit

src_text: AGOA yi vuyeriwile swinene eUnited States na le ka Khonthinente ya Afrika naswona yi le ku kuleni no va yi ri na vuxaka bya kahle lebyi fambaka hi matlhelo ya mbirhi bya bindzu exikarhi ka Afrika Dzonga na United States (US).Afrika-Dzonga ri tshembha leswaku AGOA yi nyika vuako bya kahle ku aka bindzu leri vuyerisaka hi matlhelo mambirhi na vuxaka bya vuvekisi no tiyisa ntirhisano exikarhi ka US na khonthinete ya Afrika hi ku anama ka yon Tanihi xiphemu xo tlangela xa rixaka xa Nhweti ya Vavasati, Xandla xa Phuresidente Kgalema Motlanthe u ta endzela Tiko ra Gombani hi Ravuntlhanu, wa ti 23 Mhawuri 2013, eka Masipala wa Mutale, eLimpopo, ku ya nyiketa tindlu eka vaak Vavasati va le Gombani va hoxile xandla eku akiweni ka tindlu let Holobyenkulu wa Vupfhumba u ta simeka Nhweti ya Vupfhumba hi ti 28 ta Mhawuri 2013 eLojini ya Amanzingwe, eHartebeespoort, hansi ka nhlokomhaka leyi nge:
trg_text: political and economic interestSouth Africa continues to support the G20 s development agenda that advances global economic stability and long-term sustainable growth and job creatio Cabinet commended the first meeting of the Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa (BRICS) Business Council, which saw business leaders from these countries converge in South Afric The meeting was also attended by prominent business leaders from 19 other African countrie Cabinet welcomed the assurance given at the 12th annual African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA) Forum to renew AGOA before it expires in 2015.

src_text: Mati ya Tsakis Tanihi xiphemu xa migingiriko ya nhweti, Dyondziso wa Rixaka eka Malanghele ya Tidyondzo wu ta khomiwa eka Senthara ya Nhlanganelo ya Matiko ya East London exikarhi ka ti 19 na ti 21 ta Ndzhati 2013 ku kombisa mitirho eka bindzu, leri kulaka leri sweswi ri nga thola vanhu vo hundza hafu ya miliyoni ya vaaki va Afrika-Dzong Khabinete yi tsundzukile leswaku Holobyenkulu wa Nhluvukiso wa Matikoxikaya na Antswiso Misava u ta nyika tindlu ta 70 eka vabindzuri va Xifundzha xa Ntsevu (District Six), hi Mugivela, hi ti 24 Mhawuri 2013.

src_text: Lexi i xiphemu xa mitirho yo tlhelerisela ndzhaka ya Nawu wa Misava ya Vatshami wa 1913 lowu nga siya magidi ya vanhu va vantima va ri hava makaya na misav.
trg_text: It further acknowledged the improvement made by the 21 municipalities that previously received the adverse or disclaimed opinions in the previous yeaCabinet appreciates the work done by the Auditor General in assisting the municipalities to improve on the governance compliance requirement

src_text: Khabinete yi tinghenisile eka timhaka leti sukaka eka Lekgotla ra Khabinete leri nga khomiwa hi ti 13-15 Mhawuri, 2013.
